page.title: 03Shipton Green
page.content: Shipton Green is a small hamlet about 1 mile West of Birdham. It consists of private dwellings set back from the road with a wide stretch of grass in front of many of the houses. The houses are either converted and enlarged agricultural cottages built late 19th or early 20th centuries with more modern detatched or semi-detatched houses built between or after the wars. There is a builders' merchants which has developed over the past few years from a building firm through a "do-it-yourself" shop to its present function. The Itchenor Caravan Park has caravans for sale or hire. There are 2 nurseries, one growing flowers and the other providing vegetables for sale in its own shop.
